Package com.brightcove.player.mediacontroller

Class DefaultPreviewLoader

java.lang.Object
com.brightcove.player.mediacontroller.DefaultPreviewLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
PreviewLoader
public final class DefaultPreviewLoader extends Object implements PreviewLoader
The default PreviewLoader used in the Thumbnail plugin. It uses Picasso to request and load the images into the ThumbnailView.

Use createDefault(Context) to create an instance with the default configuration, or use DefaultPreviewLoader.Builder to configure it differently.
